title: Article 1 - Classes A and B
content:
Article 1 - Classes A and B
State Regulations

Part 560 - General Provisions (§ 560.0 to 560.2)

Part 561 - Instructions-general (§ 561.1 to 561.21)

Part 562 - Instructions-balance Sheet Accounts (§ 562.1 to 562.3 to 562.9)

Part 563 - Instructions-water Plant Accounts (§ 563.1 to 563.15)

Part 564 - Instructions-unappropriated Retained Earnings Accounts (§ 564.1)

Part 565 - Instructions-income Accounts (§ 565.1 to 565.4)

Part 566 - Instructions-operating Revenue Accounts (§ 566.1 to 566.4 to 566.5)

Part 567 - Instructions-operating Expense (§ 567.1 to 567.6 to 567.7)

Accounts

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
